article_title: Democrats need power-sharing agreement to defeat Trump
article_text:
Settlement in flashlight beating case by Sacramento deputy

City asks: How about a lounge on depot roof?

00:31

article_metadata.description: As a California Democrat, I’ve fretted all year about the ominous threat of domestic fascism in our country revealed in the rhetoric and extremism of Donald Trump and his hard-core followers.
